data.title: Learn Python Basics
data.summary: Python is one of the easiest programming languages to learn because of its easy-to-use syntax. The simplicity of Python syntax allows you to focus on the logic rather than focusing on syntax. This is why we recommend you to start with Python if you are entirely new to the programming field. Learn Python Basics is designed to help complete beginners start their programming journey from scratch.</br> </br>Master the basics of Python in the most interactive way possible, solving challenges and building projects

card1.title: Combine learning with practice
card1.desc: Not just another Python course. Solve 50+ challenges and create 2 projects in real-time.

card2.title: Step-by-step guide to Python
card2.desc: No prior knowledge is required. Starting from the very basics of Python programming.

rock_paper.title: Rock, Paper & Scissors
rock_paper.desc: You will create a popular game rock paper scissors using the basic concepts of Python like functions, control flow and input/output.
